trends: There has been one other sighting in Yanceyville
There were no other sightings in Yanceyville on or around December 8th 2010
Summary: Bright Starlike object in eastern sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI stepped out on my back deck on my way out to work, still dark, but sky was beautifully clear and all the stars were so clear and beautiful so I stopped to look. Looking to were Venus was shining so brighty in the eastern sky. As I was looking suddenly a bright starlight object just popped into sight to the left and a little lower the Venus. It was just as bright and shiny as Venus and was moving in a slighly upward motion in the starfield. After moving past Venus it sudden just disappeared from view POP and it was gone. a few seconds later it reappeared much higher up above Venus where a few seconds before it was below it. It then moved off in a streak of light that was so fast my eyes could not track it . Just the trail of light it left . It was no comet because it changed direction in at least a 45* angle. I don't know what it was but it wasn't anything I know of.
